name: fullstack-react-python
description: Full-stack application with React frontend and Python backend

scripts.dev:local: npm run env:local && npm run dev
scripts.dev:vercel: npm run env:vercel && concurrently "npm run client" "vercel dev"
scripts.dev:vercel-mock: npm run env:mock && concurrently "npm run client" "node mock-vercel-server.js"
scripts.dev:vercel-simple: npm run env:vercel && npm run client
scripts.install-all: npm run install-client && npm run install-server
